title: Jennette McCurdy Discusses SelfAuthoring
description:
My daughter @Mikhaila Peterson spoke with the actress and producer @Jennette McCurdy on The Mikhaila Peterson Podcast recently (full episode at: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yYnMUcERov0). During the conversation, Jennette discussed her efforts at organizing her life, and detailed her use of the https://www.selfauthoring.com program, which my colleagues Dr. Robert Pihl and Dr. Daniel M Higgins and I developed to help people get their stories straight.

Use the new discount code “MP” for 15% off the program, for yourself or as a gift. That code also works for understandmyself.com, our five factor ten aspect personality test (now featuring a couples Report)

https://www.selfauthoring.com – Write and sort out your past, present, and future.

https://www.understandmyself.com – a scientifically accurate personality assessment based on the Big 5 ten aspect personality traits


15 % DISCOUNT CODE: MP
